::CyberShark::

    "I understand." CyberShark said. He kinda chuckled when she asked where 
the base is. "It's up in those mountains, follow me." He transformed into 
Robot mode and started walking  
    Soon they were near. "The Autoguns are made to reconize only Destron 
signals, it will fire on anything else. They can't really be shut down so 
wear this. That way no more damage comes to you."

______________________________________________________________________
::Magmatron::

    He saw CyberShark and a new bot walk up to the base. He was still 
monitering CyberShark's mind.  The thought transmitter had been disabled, he 
could only catch a glimse of what CyberShark was thinking. Magmatron was not 
happy, CyberShark was remembering an old life. He was starting to fall in 
love with the new bot. This was not good for Magmatron's plans. He'd have to 
make room around this news in oreder to complete his goal.
